077/**
078 *  The implementation for
079 *  {@link MethodSpec}.
080 *
081 *  @author Square,Inc.
082 *  @modified   Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
083 *  @version $Id: MethodSpecImpl.java 1065 2023-09-28 06:16:50Z tquadrat $
084 *  @since 0.0.5
085 *
086 *  @UMLGraph.link
087 */
088@SuppressWarnings( {"ClassWithTooManyFields"} )
089@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: MethodSpecImpl.java 1065 2023-09-28 06:16:50Z tquadrat $" )
090@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5" )
091public final class MethodSpecImpl implements MethodSpec
092{
093        /*---------------*\
094    ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
095        \*---------------*/
096    /**
097     *  The implementation for
098     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.MethodSpec.Builder}
099     *
100     *  @author Square,Inc.
101     *  @modified   Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
102     *  @version $Id: MethodSpecImpl.java 1065 2023-09-28 06:16:50Z tquadrat $
103     *  @since 0.0.5
104     *
105     *  @UMLGraph.link
106     */
107    @ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: MethodSpecImpl.java 1065 2023-09-28 06:16:50Z tquadrat $" )
108    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5" )
109    public static final class BuilderImpl implements MethodSpec.Builder
110    {
111            /*------------*\
112        ====** Attributes **===================================================
113            \*------------*/
114        /**
115         *  The annotations for the method.
116         */
117        private final Collection<AnnotationSpecImpl> m_Annotations = new ArrayList<>();
118
119        /**
120         *  The code for the method.
121         */
122        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
123        private final CodeBlockImpl.BuilderImpl m_Code;
124
125        /**
126         *  The reference to the factory.
127         */
128        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
129        private final JavaComposer m_Composer;
130
131        /**
132         *  The default value for the method; this is for annotations only.
133         */
134        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
135        private CodeBlockImpl m_DefaultValue;
136
137        /**
138         *  The declared exceptions for the method.
139         */
140        private final Collection<TypeNameImpl> m_Exceptions = new LinkedHashSet<>();
141
142        /**
143         *  The Javadoc comment for the method.
144         */
145        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
146        private final CodeBlockImpl.BuilderImpl m_Javadoc;
147
148        /**
149         *  The modifiers for the method.
150         */
151        private final Set<Modifier> m_Modifiers = EnumSet.noneOf( Modifier.class );
152
153        /**
154         *  The name for the method.
155         */
156        private final String m_Name;
157
158        /**
159         *  The parameters for the method.
160         */
161        private final List<ParameterSpecImpl> m_Parameters = new ArrayList<>();
162
163        /**
164         *  The comment for the return value for the method.
165         */
166        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
167        private final CodeBlockImpl.BuilderImpl m_ReturnComment;
168
169        /**
170         *  The return type for the method.
171         */
172        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
173        private TypeNameImpl m_ReturnType;
174
175        /**
176         *  The static imports.
177         */
178        private final Collection<String> m_StaticImports = new TreeSet<>();
179
180        /**
181         *  The type variables for the method.
182         */
183        private final Collection<TypeVariableNameImpl> m_TypeVariables = new ArrayList<>();
184
185        /**
186         *  The flag that indicates whether a parameter (the last one) is a
187         *  {@code varargs} parameter.
188         */
189        private boolean m_Varargs = false;
190
191            /*--------------*\
192        ====** Constructors **=================================================
193            \*--------------*/
194        /**
195         *  Creates a new {@code BuilderImpl} instance.
196         *
197         *  @param  composer    The reference to the factory that created this
198         *      builder instance.
199         *  @param  name    The name for the method.
200         */
201        public BuilderImpl( @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" ) final JavaComposer composer, final CharSequence name )
202        {
203            m_Composer = requireNonNullArgument( composer, "composer" );
204            m_Name = requireValidArgument( requireNotEmptyArgument( name, "name" ), "name", v -> v.equals( CONSTRUCTOR ) || isValidName( v ), $ -> "not a valid name: %s".formatted( name ) ).toString().intern();
205            m_ReturnType = name.equals( CONSTRUCTOR ) ? null : VOID_PRIMITIVE;
206
207            m_Code = (CodeBlockImpl.BuilderImpl) m_Composer.codeBlockBuilder();
208            m_Javadoc = (CodeBlockImpl.BuilderImpl) m_Composer.codeBlockBuilder();
209            m_ReturnComment = (CodeBlockImpl.BuilderImpl) m_Composer.codeBlockBuilder();
210        }   //  BuilderImpl()
211
212            /*---------*\
213        ====** Methods **======================================================
214            \*---------*/
215        /**
216         *  {@inheritDoc}
217         */
218        @Override
219        public final BuilderImpl addAnnotation( final AnnotationSpec annotationSpec )
220        {
221            m_Annotations.add( (AnnotationSpecImpl) requireNonNullArgument( annotationSpec, "annotationSpec" ) );
222
223            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
224            return this;
225        }   //  addAnnotation()
226
227        /**
228         *  {@inheritDoc}
229         */
230        @Override
231        public final BuilderImpl addAnnotation( final Class<?> annotation )
232        {
233            return addAnnotation( ClassNameImpl.from( requireNonNullArgument( annotation, "annotation" ) ) );
234        }   //  addAnnotation()
235
236        /**
237         *  {@inheritDoc}
238         */
239        @Override
240        public final BuilderImpl addAnnotation( final ClassName annotationClass )
241        {
242            final var annotation = (AnnotationSpecImpl) m_Composer.annotationBuilder( requireNonNullArgument( annotationClass, "annotationClass" ) )
243                .build();
244            m_Annotations.add( annotation );
245
246            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
247            return this;
248        }   //  addAnnotation()
249
250        /**
251         *  {@inheritDoc}
252         */
253        @Override
254        public final BuilderImpl addAnnotations( final Iterable<? extends AnnotationSpec> annotationSpecs )
255        {
256            for( final AnnotationSpec annotationSpec : requireNonNullArgument( annotationSpecs, "annotationSpecs" ) )
257            {
258                m_Annotations.add( (AnnotationSpecImpl) annotationSpec );
259            }
260
261            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
262            return this;
263        }   //  addAnnotations()
264
265        /**
266         *  {@inheritDoc}
267         */
268        @Override
269        public final BuilderImpl addCode( final CodeBlock codeBlock )
270        {
271            m_Code.add( requireNonNullArgument( codeBlock, "codeBlock" ) );
272
273            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
274            return this;
275        }   //  addCode()
276
277        /**
278         *  {@inheritDoc}
279         */
280        @Override
281        public final BuilderImpl addCode( final String format, final Object... args )
282        {
283            m_Code.add( format, args );
284
285            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
286            return this;
287        }   //  addCode()
288
289        /**
290         *  {@inheritDoc}
291         */
292        @SuppressWarnings( {"removal"} )
293        @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
294        @Override
295        @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.6" )
296        public final BuilderImpl addCode( final boolean addDebugOutput, final String format, final Object... args )
297        {
298            m_Code.add( createDebugOutput( addDebugOutput, true ), format, args );
299
300            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
301            return this;
302        }   //  addCode()
303
304        /**
305         *  {@inheritDoc}
306         */
307        @Override
308        public final BuilderImpl addComment( final String format, final Object... args )
309        {
310            m_Code.addWithoutDebugInfo( "// " + requireNonNullArgument( format, "format" ) + "\n", args );
311
312            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
313            return this;
314        }   //  addComment()
315
316        /**
317         *  {@inheritDoc}
318         */
319        @Override
320        public final BuilderImpl addException( final Type exception )
321        {
322            return addException( TypeNameImpl.from( requireNonNullArgument( exception, "exception" ) ) );
323        }   //  addException()
324
325        /**
326         *  {@inheritDoc}
327         */
328        @Override
329        public final BuilderImpl addException( final TypeName exception )
330        {
331            m_Exceptions.add( (TypeNameImpl) requireNonNullArgument( exception, "exception" ) );
332
333            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
334            return this;
335        }   //  addException()
336
337        /**
338         *  {@inheritDoc}
339         */
340        @Override
341        public final BuilderImpl addExceptions( final Iterable<? extends TypeName> exceptions )
342        {
343            for( final TypeName exception : requireNonNullArgument( exceptions, "exceptions" ) )
344            {
345                m_Exceptions.add( (TypeNameImpl) exception );
346            }
347
348            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
349            return this;
350        }   //  addExceptions()
351
352        /**
353         *  {@inheritDoc}
354         */
355        @Override
356        public final BuilderImpl addJavadoc( final CodeBlock block )
357        {
358            m_Javadoc.add( block );
359
360            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
361            return this;
362        }   //  addJavadoc()
363
364        /**
365         *  {@inheritDoc}
366         */
367        @Override
368        public final BuilderImpl addJavadoc( final String format, final Object... args )
369        {
370            m_Javadoc.addWithoutDebugInfo( format, args );
371
372            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
373            return this;
374        }   //  addJavadoc()
375
376        /**
377         *  {@inheritDoc}
378         */
379        @SuppressWarnings( {"BoundedWildcard"} )
380        @Override
381        public final BuilderImpl addModifiers( final Iterable<Modifier> modifiers )
382        {
383            for( final var modifier : requireNonNullArgument( modifiers, "modifiers" ) )
384            {
385                m_Modifiers.add( modifier );
386            }
387
388            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
389            return this;
390        }   //  addModifiers()
391
392        /**
393         *  {@inheritDoc}
394         */
395        @Override
396        public final BuilderImpl addModifiers( final Modifier... modifiers )
397        {
398            addAll( m_Modifiers, requireNonNullArgument( modifiers, "modifiers" ) );
399
400            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
401            return this;
402        }   //  addModifiers()
403
404        /**
405         *  {@inheritDoc}
406         */
407        @Override
408        public final BuilderImpl addNamedCode( final String format, final Map<String,?> args )
409        {
410            m_Code.addNamed( format, args );
411
412            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
413            return this;
414        }   //  addNamedCode()
415
416        /**
417         *  {@inheritDoc}
418         *
419         *  @deprecated  Got obsolete with the introduction of
420         *      {@link JavaComposer}.
421         */
422        @SuppressWarnings( {"removal"} )
423        @Override
424        @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
425        @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.6" )
426        public final BuilderImpl addNamedCode( final boolean addDebugOutput, final String format, final Map<String,?> args )
427        {
428            m_Code.addNamed( createDebugOutput( addDebugOutput, true ), format, args );
429
430            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
431            return this;
432        }   //  addNamedCode()
433
434        /**
435         *  {@inheritDoc}
436         */
437        @Override
438        public final BuilderImpl addParameter( final ParameterSpec parameterSpec )
439        {
440            m_Parameters.add( (ParameterSpecImpl) requireNonNullArgument( parameterSpec, "parameterSpec" ) );
441
442            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
443            return this;
444        }   //  addParameter()
445
446        /**
447         *  {@inheritDoc}
448         */
449        @Override
450        public final BuilderImpl addParameter( final Type type, final String name, final Modifier... modifiers )
451        {
452            return addParameter( TypeName.from( requireNonNullArgument( type, "type" ) ), name, modifiers );
453        }   //  addParameter()
454
455        /**
456         *  {@inheritDoc}
457         */
458        @Override
459        public final BuilderImpl addParameter( final TypeName type, final String name, final Modifier... modifiers )
460        {
461            final var parameter =  m_Composer.parameterBuilder( type, name, modifiers )
462                .build();
463            final var retValue = addParameter( parameter );
464
465            //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
466            return retValue;
467        }   //  addParameter()
468
469        /**
470         *  {@inheritDoc}
471         */
472        @Override
473        public final BuilderImpl addParameters( final Iterable<? extends ParameterSpec> parameterSpecs )
474        {
475            for( final ParameterSpec parameterSpec : requireNonNullArgument( parameterSpecs, "parameterSpecs" ) )
476            {
477                m_Parameters.add( (ParameterSpecImpl) parameterSpec );
478            }
479
480            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
481            return this;
482        }   //  addParameters()
483
484        /**
485         *  {@inheritDoc}
486         */
487        @Override
488        public final BuilderImpl addStatement( final CodeBlock statement )
489        {
490            m_Code.addStatement( requireNonNullArgument( statement, "statement" ) );
491
492            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
493            return this;
494        }   //  addStatement()
495
496        /**
497         *  {@inheritDoc}
498         */
499        @Override
500        public final BuilderImpl addStatement( final String format, final Object... args )

502            m_Code.addStatement( format, args );
503
504            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
505            return this;
506        }   //  addStatement()

514        @SuppressWarnings( {"removal"} )

516        @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
517        @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.6" )
518        public final BuilderImpl addStatement( final boolean addDebugOutput, final String format, final Object... args )
519        {
520            m_Code.addStatement( createDebugOutput( addDebugOutput, true ), format, args );
521
522            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
523            return this;
524        }   //  addStatement()
525
526        /**
527         *  {@inheritDoc}
528         */
529        @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
530        @Override
531        public final MethodSpecImpl.BuilderImpl addStaticImport( final Class<?> clazz, final String... names )
532        {
533            return addStaticImport( ClassNameImpl.from( clazz ), names );
534        }   //  addStaticImport()
535
536        /**
537         *  {@inheritDoc}
538         */
539        @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
540        @Override
541        public final MethodSpecImpl.BuilderImpl addStaticImport( final ClassName className, final String... names )
542        {
543            final var canonicalName = requireNonNullArgument( className, "className" ).canonicalName();
544            for( final var name : requireValidNonNullArgument( names, "names", v -> v.length > 0, "%s array is empty"::formatted ) )
545            {
546                m_StaticImports.add(
547                    format(
548                        "%s.%s",
549                        canonicalName,
550                        requireValidArgument(
551                            name,
552                            "name",
553                            Objects::nonNull,
554                            $ -> "null entry in names array: %s".formatted( Arrays.toString( names ) )
555                        )
556                    )
557                );
558            }
559
560            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
561            return this;
562        }   //  addStaticImport()
563
564        /**
565         *  {@inheritDoc}
566         */
567        @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
568        @Override
569        public final MethodSpecImpl.BuilderImpl addStaticImport( final Enum<?> constant )
570        {
571            return addStaticImport( ClassNameImpl.from( requireNonNullArgument( constant, "constant" ).getDeclaringClass() ), constant.name() );
572        }   //  addStaticImport()
573
574        /**
575         *  {@inheritDoc}
576         */
577        @Override
578        public final BuilderImpl addTypeVariable( final TypeVariableName typeVariable )
579        {
580            m_TypeVariables.add( (TypeVariableNameImpl) typeVariable );
581
582            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
583            return this;
584        }   //  addTypeVariable()
585
586        /**
587         *  {@inheritDoc}
588         */
589        @Override
590        public final BuilderImpl addTypeVariables( final Iterable<TypeVariableName> typeVariables )
591        {
592            for( final var typeVariable : requireNonNullArgument( typeVariables, "typeVariables" ) )
593            {
594                m_TypeVariables.add( (TypeVariableNameImpl) typeVariable );
595            }
596
597            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
598            return this;
599        }   //  addTypeVariables()
600
601        /**
602         *  {@inheritDoc}
603         */
604        @Override
605        public final BuilderImpl beginControlFlow( final String controlFlow, final Object... args )
606        {
607            m_Code.beginControlFlow( controlFlow, args );
608
609            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
610            return this;
611        }   //  beginControlFlow()
612
613        /**
614         *  {@inheritDoc}
615         *
616         *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
617         *      {@link JavaComposer}.
618         */
619        @SuppressWarnings( {"removal"} )
620        @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
621        @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.6" )
622        @Override
623        public final BuilderImpl beginControlFlow( final boolean addDebugOutput, final String controlFlow, final Object... args )
624        {
625            m_Code.beginControlFlow( createDebugOutput( addDebugOutput, true ), controlFlow, args );
626
627            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
628            return this;
629        }   //  beginControlFlow()
630
631        /**
632         *  {@inheritDoc}
633         */
634        @Override
635        public final MethodSpecImpl build()
636        {
637            /*
638             * A method with a body cannot be abstract.
639             * We remove the modifier abstract here so that
640             * MethodSpec.toBuilder() will work properly.
641             */
642            if( !m_Code.isEmpty() )
643            {
644                m_Modifiers.remove( ABSTRACT );
645            }
646            final var retValue = new MethodSpecImpl( this );
647
648            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
649            return retValue;
650        }   //  build()
651
652        /**
653         *  {@inheritDoc}
654         */
655        @Override
656        public final BuilderImpl defaultValue( final CodeBlock defaultValue )
657        {
658            checkState( isNull( m_DefaultValue ), () -> new IllegalStateException( "defaultValue was already set" ) );
659            var codeBlockImpl = (CodeBlockImpl) requireNonNullArgument( defaultValue, "defaultValue" );
660            if( m_Composer.addDebugOutput() )
661            {
662                codeBlockImpl = (CodeBlockImpl) createDebugOutput( true )
663                    .map( DebugOutput::asComment )
664                    .map( m_Composer::codeBlockOf )
665                    .map( block -> block.join( " ", defaultValue ) )
666                    .orElse( defaultValue );
667            }
668            m_DefaultValue = codeBlockImpl;
669
670            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
671            return this;
672        }   //  defaultValue()
673
674        /**
675         *  {@inheritDoc}
676         */
677        @Override
678        public final BuilderImpl defaultValue( final String format, final Object... args )
679        {
680            return defaultValue( m_Composer.codeBlockOf( format, args ) );
681        }   //  defaultValue()
682
683        /**
684         *  {@inheritDoc}
685         */
686        @Override
687        public final BuilderImpl endControlFlow()
688        {
689            m_Code.endControlFlow();
690
691            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
692            return this;
693        }   //  endControlFlow()
694
695        /**
696         *  {@inheritDoc}
697         */
698        @Override
699        public final BuilderImpl endControlFlow( final String controlFlow, final Object... args )
700        {
701            m_Code.endControlFlow( controlFlow, args );
702
703            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
704            return this;
705        }   //  endControlFlow()
706
707        /**
708         *  {@inheritDoc}
709         *
710         *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
711         *      {@link JavaComposer}.
712         */
713        @SuppressWarnings( {"removal"} )
714        @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
715        @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.6" )
716        @Override
717        public final BuilderImpl endControlFlow( final boolean addDebugOutput, final String controlFlow, final Object... args )
718        {
719            m_Code.endControlFlow( createDebugOutput( addDebugOutput, true ), controlFlow, args );
720
721            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
722            return this;
723        }   //  endControlFlow()
724
725        /**
726         *  Returns <i>a reference to</i> the declared exceptions.
727         *
728         *  @return The exceptions.
729         */
730        @SuppressWarnings( {"PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface", "AssignmentOrReturnOfFieldWithMutableType"} )
731        public final Collection<TypeNameImpl> exceptions()
732        {
733            return m_Exceptions ;
734        }   //  exceptions()
735
736        /**
737         *  {@inheritDoc}
738         */
739        @Override
740        public final BuilderImpl nextControlFlow( final String controlFlow, final Object... args )
741        {
742            m_Code.nextControlFlow( controlFlow, args );
743
744            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
745            return this;
746        }   //  nextControlFlow()
747
748        /**
749         *  {@inheritDoc}
750         *
751         *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
752         *      {@link JavaComposer}.
753         */
754        @SuppressWarnings( {"removal"} )
755        @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
756        @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.6" )
757        @Override
758        public final BuilderImpl nextControlFlow( final boolean addDebugOutput, final String controlFlow, final Object... args )
759        {
760            m_Code.nextControlFlow( createDebugOutput( addDebugOutput, true ), controlFlow, args );
761
762            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
763            return this;
764        }   //  nextControlFlow()
765
766        /**
767         *  Returns <i>a reference to</i>the parameters.
768         *
769         *  @return The parameters.
770         */
771        @SuppressWarnings( {"PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface", "AssignmentOrReturnOfFieldWithMutableType"} )
772        public final List<ParameterSpecImpl> parameters()
773        {
774            return m_Parameters;
775        }   //  parameters()
776        /**
777         *  {@inheritDoc}
778         */
779        @Override
780        public final BuilderImpl returns( final Type returnType )
781        {
782            return returns( TypeNameImpl.from( requireNonNullArgument( returnType, "returnType" ) ) );
783        }   //  returns()
784
785        /**
786         *  {@inheritDoc}
787         */
788        @Override
789        public final BuilderImpl returns( final Type returnType, final String format, final Object... args )
790        {
791            return returns( TypeNameImpl.from( requireNonNullArgument( returnType, "returnType" ) ), format, args );
792        }   //  returns()
793
794        /**
795         *  {@inheritDoc}
796         */
797        @Override
798        public final BuilderImpl returns( final TypeName returnType )
799        {
800            checkState( !m_Name.equals( CONSTRUCTOR ), () -> new IllegalStateException( "constructor cannot have return type." ) );
801            m_ReturnType = (TypeNameImpl) requireNonNullArgument( returnType, "returnType" );
802            createDebugOutput( m_Composer.addDebugOutput() )
803                .ifPresent( debug -> m_ReturnComment.addWithoutDebugInfo( debug.asLiteral() ) );
804
805            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
806            return this;
807        }   //  returns()
808
809        /**
810         *  {@inheritDoc}
811         */
812        @Override
813        public final BuilderImpl returns( final TypeName returnType, final String format, final Object... args )
814        {
815            returns( returnType );
816            m_ReturnComment.addWithoutDebugInfo( format, args );
817
818            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
819            return this;
820        }   //  returns()
821
822        /**
823         *  {@inheritDoc}
824         */
825        @Override
826        public final BuilderImpl varargs() { return varargs( true ); }
827
828        /**
829         *  {@inheritDoc}
830         */
831        @Override
832        public final BuilderImpl varargs( final boolean varargs )
833        {
834            m_Varargs = varargs;
835
836            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
837            return this;
838        }   //  varargs()
839    }
840    //  class BuilderImpl
841
842        /*------------*\
843    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
844        \*------------*/
845    /**
846     *  The annotations of this method.
847     */
848    private final List<AnnotationSpecImpl> m_Annotations;
849
850    /**
851     *  Lazily initialised return value of
852     *  {@link #toString()}
853     *  for this instance.
854     */
855    private final Lazy<String> m_CachedString;
856
857    /**
858     *  The code of this method.
859     */
860    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
861    private final CodeBlockImpl m_Code;
862
863    /**
864     *  The reference to the factory.
865     */
866    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
867    private final JavaComposer m_Composer;
868
869    /**
870     *  The default value of this method; only applicable for annotations.
871     */
872    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
873    private final Optional<CodeBlockImpl> m_DefaultValue;
874
875    /**
876     *  The declared exceptions for this method.
877     */
878    private final List<TypeNameImpl> m_Exceptions;
879
880    /**
881     *  The Javadoc comment of this method.
882     */
883    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
884    private final CodeBlockImpl m_Javadoc;
885
886    /**
887     *  The modifiers of this method.
888     */
889    private final Set<Modifier> m_Modifiers;
890
891    /**
892     *  The name of this method.
893     */
894    private final String m_Name;
895
896    /**
897     *  The parameters of this method.
898     */
899    private final List<ParameterSpecImpl> m_Parameters;
900
901    /**
902     *  The comment for the return value of the method.
903     */
904    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
905    private final CodeBlockImpl m_ReturnComment;
906
907    /**
908     *  The return type of the method.
909     */
910    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
911    private final TypeNameImpl m_ReturnType;
912
913    /**
914     *  The static imports.
915     */
916    private final Set<String> m_StaticImports;
917
918    /**
919     *  The type variables of this method.
920     */
921    private final List<TypeVariableNameImpl> m_TypeVariables;
922
923    /**
924     *  The flag that indicates whether a parameter (the last one) is a
925     *  {@code varargs} parameter.
926     */
927    private final boolean m_Varargs;
928
929        /*--------------*\
930    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
931        \*--------------*/
932    /**
933     *  Creates a new {@code MethodSpecImpl} instance.
934     *
935     *  @param  builder The builder.
936     */
937    @SuppressWarnings( {"AccessingNonPublicFieldOfAnotherObject"} )
938    public MethodSpecImpl( @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" ) final BuilderImpl builder )
939    {
940        checkState( !builder.m_Varargs || lastParameterIsArray( builder.m_Parameters ), () -> new ValidationException( "last parameter of varargs method %s must be an array".formatted( builder.m_Name ) ) );
941
942        final var code = builder.m_Code.build();
943        checkState( code.isEmpty() || !builder.m_Modifiers.contains( ABSTRACT ), () -> new ValidationException( "abstract method %s cannot have code".formatted( builder.m_Name ) ) );
944
945        m_Composer = builder.m_Composer;
946        m_Name = builder.m_Name;
947        m_Javadoc = builder.m_Javadoc.build();
948        m_Annotations = List.copyOf( builder.m_Annotations );
949        m_Modifiers = Set.copyOf( builder.m_Modifiers );
950        m_TypeVariables = List.copyOf( builder.m_TypeVariables );
951        m_ReturnType = builder.m_ReturnType;
952        m_ReturnComment = builder.m_ReturnComment.build();
953        m_Parameters = List.copyOf( builder.parameters() );
954        m_Varargs = builder.m_Varargs;
955        m_Exceptions = List.copyOf( builder.exceptions() );
956        m_DefaultValue = Optional.ofNullable( builder.m_DefaultValue );
957        m_Code = code;
958
959        final Collection<String> staticImports = new HashSet<>( builder.m_StaticImports );
960        staticImports.addAll( m_Javadoc.getStaticImports() );
961        staticImports.addAll( m_ReturnComment.getStaticImports() );
962        m_Parameters.stream()
963            .map( ParameterSpecImpl::javadoc )
964            .filter( Optional::isPresent )
965            .map( codeBlock -> codeBlock.map( block -> (CodeBlockImpl) block ).get().getStaticImports() )
966            .forEach( staticImports::addAll );
967        m_DefaultValue.ifPresent( codeBlock -> staticImports.addAll( codeBlock.getStaticImports() ) );
968        staticImports.addAll( m_Code.getStaticImports() );
969        m_StaticImports = Set.copyOf( staticImports );
970
971        m_CachedString = Lazy.use( this::initializeCachedString );
972    }   //  MethodSpecImpl()
973
974        /*---------*\
975    ====** Methods **==========================================================
976        \*---------*/
977    /**
978     *  Creates a builder that builds an instance of {@code MethodSpec} for a
979     *  constructor.
980     *
981     *  @return The builder.
982     *
983     *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
984     *      {@link JavaComposer}.
985     */
986    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
987    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
988    public static final BuilderImpl constructorBuilder()
989    {
990        final var retValue = new BuilderImpl( new JavaComposer(), CONSTRUCTOR );
991
992        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
993        return retValue;
994    }   //  constructorBuilder()
995
996    /**
997     *  Returns the default value of this method.
998     *
999     *  @return An instance of
1000     *      {@link Optional}
1001     *      that holds the default value.
1002     */
1003    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
1004    public final Optional<CodeBlockImpl> defaultValue() { return m_DefaultValue; }
1005
1006    /**
1007     *  Emits the Javadoc to the given code writer.
1008     *
1009     *  @param  codeWriter  The code writer.
1010     *  @throws UncheckedIOException A problem occurred when writing to the
1011     *      output target.
1012     */
1013    private final void emitJavadoc( @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" ) final CodeWriter codeWriter ) throws UncheckedIOException
1014    {
1015        final var javaDocBuilder = m_Javadoc.toBuilder();
1016        var addNewLine = false;
1017        @SuppressWarnings( {"OptionalGetWithoutIsPresent"} )
1018        final var paramComments = m_Parameters.stream()
1019            .filter( p -> p.javadoc().isPresent() )
1020            .map( p -> (CodeBlockImpl) p.javadoc().get() )
1021            .toArray( CodeBlockImpl[]::new );
1022        addNewLine = paramComments.length > 0;
1023        for( final var comment : paramComments )
1024        {
1025            javaDocBuilder.add( comment );
1026        }
1027        if( !m_ReturnComment.isEmpty() )
1028        {
1029            javaDocBuilder.add( m_Composer.codeBlockOf( "\n@return $L", m_ReturnComment ) );
1030            addNewLine = true;
1031        }
1032        if( addNewLine ) javaDocBuilder.add( "\n" );
1033        codeWriter.emitJavadoc( javaDocBuilder.build() );
1034    }   //  emitJavadoc()
1035
1036    /**
1037     *  Emits this method to the given code writer.
1038     *
1039     *  @param  codeWriter  The code writer.
1040     *  @param  enclosingName   The name of the type that owns this method.
1041     *  @param  implicitModifiers   The implicit modifiers for this method.
1042     *  @throws UncheckedIOException A problem occurred when writing to the
1043     *      output target.
1044     */
1045    @SuppressWarnings( {"PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface", "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType"} )
1046    public final void emit( @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" ) final CodeWriter codeWriter, final Optional<String> enclosingName, final Collection<Modifier> implicitModifiers ) throws UncheckedIOException
1047    {
1048        switch( codeWriter.layout() )
1049        {
1050            case LAYOUT_FOUNDATION -> emit4Foundation( codeWriter, enclosingName, implicitModifiers );
1051            case LAYOUT_DEFAULT, LAYOUT_JAVAPOET, LAYOUT_JAVAPOET_WITH_TAB -> emit4JavaPoet( codeWriter, enclosingName, implicitModifiers );
1052            default -> throw new UnsupportedEnumError( codeWriter.layout() );
1053        }
1054    }   //  emit()
1055
1056    /**
1057     *  Emits this method to the given code writer, using the Foundation
1058     *  layout.
1059     *
1060     *  @param  codeWriter  The code writer.
1061     *  @param  enclosingName   The name of the type that owns this method.
1062     *  @param  implicitModifiers   The implicit modifiers for this method.
1063     *  @throws UncheckedIOException A problem occurred when writing to the
1064     *      output target.
1065     */
1066    @SuppressWarnings( {"OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType", "OverlyComplexMethod"} )
1067    private final void emit4Foundation( @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" ) final CodeWriter codeWriter, final Optional<String> enclosingName, final Collection<Modifier> implicitModifiers ) throws UncheckedIOException
1068    {
1069        emitJavadoc( codeWriter );
1070        codeWriter.emitAnnotations( m_Annotations, false );
1071        codeWriter.emitModifiers( m_Modifiers, implicitModifiers );
1072
1073        if( !m_TypeVariables.isEmpty() )
1074        {
1075            codeWriter.emitTypeVariables( m_TypeVariables );
1076            codeWriter.emit( " " );
1077        }
1078
1079        if( isConstructor() )
1080        {
1081            /*
1082             * Anonymous types do not have a constructor, therefore there is
1083             * no check required for the name.
1084             */
1085            //noinspection OptionalGetWithoutIsPresent
1086            codeWriter.emit( "$L", enclosingName.get() );
1087        }
1088        else
1089        {
1090            codeWriter.emit( "$T $L", m_ReturnType, m_Name );
1091        }
1092
1093        if( !m_Parameters.isEmpty() )
1094        {
1095            codeWriter.emit( "( " );
1096            var firstParameter = true;
1097            for( final var iterator = m_Parameters.iterator(); iterator.hasNext(); )
1098            {
1099                final var parameter = iterator.next();
1100                if( !firstParameter ) codeWriter.emit( "," ).emitWrappingSpace();
1101                parameter.emit( codeWriter, !iterator.hasNext() && m_Varargs );
1102                firstParameter = false;
1103            }
1104            codeWriter.emit( " )" );
1105        }
1106        else
1107        {
1108            codeWriter.emit( "()" );
1109        }
1110
1111        if( m_DefaultValue.isPresent() && !m_DefaultValue.get().isEmpty() )
1112        {
1113            codeWriter.emit( " default " );
1114            codeWriter.emit( m_DefaultValue.get() );
1115        }
1116
1117        if( !m_Exceptions.isEmpty() )
1118        {
1119            codeWriter.emitWrappingSpace().emit( "throws" );
1120            var firstException = true;
1121            for( final var exception : m_Exceptions )
1122            {
1123                if( !firstException ) codeWriter.emit( "," );
1124                codeWriter.emitWrappingSpace().emit( "$T", exception );
1125                firstException = false;
1126            }
1127        }
1128
1129        if( hasModifier( ABSTRACT ) )
1130        {
1131            codeWriter.emit( ";\n" );
1132        }
1133        else if( hasModifier( NATIVE ) )
1134        {
1135            //---* Code is allowed to support stuff like GWT JSNI *------------
1136            codeWriter.emit( m_Code );
1137            codeWriter.emit( ";\n" );
1138        }
1139        else
1140        {
1141            codeWriter.emit( "\n{" );
1142
1143            if( !m_Code.isEmpty() )
1144            {
1145                codeWriter.emit( "\n" )
1146                    .indent()
1147                    .emit( m_Code )
1148                    .unindent();
1149            }
1150
1151            if( isConstructor() )
1152            {
1153                //noinspection OptionalGetWithoutIsPresent
1154                codeWriter.emit( "}  //  $L()\n", enclosingName.get() );
1155            }
1156            else
1157            {
1158                codeWriter.emit( "}  //  $L()\n", m_Name );
1159            }
1160        }
1161    }   //  emit4Foundation()
1162
1163    /**
1164     *  Emits this method to the given code writer, using the JavaPoet layout.
1165     *
1166     *  @param  codeWriter  The code writer.
1167     *  @param  enclosingName   The name of the type that owns this method.
1168     *  @param  implicitModifiers   The implicit modifiers for this method.
1169     *  @throws UncheckedIOException A problem occurred when writing to the
1170     *      output target.
1171     */
1172    @SuppressWarnings( {"OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType", "OverlyComplexMethod"} )
1173    private final void emit4JavaPoet( @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" ) final CodeWriter codeWriter, final Optional<String> enclosingName, final Collection<Modifier> implicitModifiers ) throws UncheckedIOException
1174    {
1175        emitJavadoc( codeWriter );
1176        codeWriter.emitAnnotations( m_Annotations, false );
1177        codeWriter.emitModifiers( m_Modifiers, implicitModifiers );
1178
1179        if( !m_TypeVariables.isEmpty() )
1180        {
1181            codeWriter.emitTypeVariables( m_TypeVariables );
1182            codeWriter.emit( " " );
1183        }
1184
1185        if( isConstructor() )
1186        {
1187            /*
1188             * Anonymous types do not have a constructor, therefore there is
1189             * no check required for the name.
1190             */
1191            //noinspection OptionalGetWithoutIsPresent
1192            codeWriter.emit( "$L($Z", enclosingName.get() );
1193        }
1194        else
1195        {
1196            codeWriter.emit( "$T $L($Z", m_ReturnType, m_Name );
1197        }
1198
1199        var firstParameter = true;
1200        for( final var iterator = m_Parameters.iterator(); iterator.hasNext(); )
1201        {
1202            final var parameter = iterator.next();
1203            if( !firstParameter ) codeWriter.emit( "," ).emitWrappingSpace();
1204            parameter.emit( codeWriter, !iterator.hasNext() && m_Varargs );
1205            firstParameter = false;
1206        }
1207
1208        codeWriter.emit( ")" );
1209
1210        if( m_DefaultValue.isPresent() && !m_DefaultValue.get().isEmpty() )
1211        {
1212            codeWriter.emit( " default " );
1213            codeWriter.emit( m_DefaultValue.get() );
1214        }
1215
1216        if( !m_Exceptions.isEmpty() )
1217        {
1218            codeWriter.emitWrappingSpace().emit( "throws" );
1219            var firstException = true;
1220            for( final var exception : m_Exceptions )
1221            {
1222                if( !firstException ) codeWriter.emit( "," );
1223                codeWriter.emitWrappingSpace().emit( "$T", exception );
1224                firstException = false;
1225            }
1226        }
1227
1228        if( hasModifier( ABSTRACT ) )
1229        {
1230            codeWriter.emit( ";\n" );
1231        }
1232        else if( hasModifier( NATIVE ) )
1233        {
1234            //---* Code is allowed to support stuff like GWT JSNI *------------
1235            codeWriter.emit( m_Code );
1236            codeWriter.emit( ";\n" );
1237        }
1238        else
1239        {
1240            codeWriter.emit( " {\n" );
1241
1242            codeWriter.indent();
1243            codeWriter.emit( m_Code );
1244            codeWriter.unindent();
1245
1246            codeWriter.emit( "}\n" );
1247        }
1248    }   //  emit4JavaPoet()
1249
1250    /**
1251     *  {@inheritDoc}
1252     */
1253    @Override
1254    public final boolean equals( final Object o )
1255    {
1256        var retValue = this == o;
1257        if( !retValue && (o instanceof final MethodSpecImpl other) )
1258        {
1259            retValue = m_Composer.equals( other.m_Composer ) && toString().equals( o.toString() );
1260        }
1261
1262        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1263        return retValue;
1264    }   //  equals()
1265
1266    /**
1267     *  Returns the declared exceptions for this method.
1268     *
1269     *  @return The declared exceptions.
1270     */
1271    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
1272    public final List<TypeNameImpl> exceptions() { return m_Exceptions; }
1273
1274    /**
1275     *  Returns the
1276     *  {@link JavaComposer}
1277     *  factory.
1278     *
1279     *  @return The reference to the factory.
1280     */
1281    @SuppressWarnings( {"PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface"} )
1282    public final JavaComposer getFactory() { return m_Composer; }
1283
1284    /**
1285     *  Returns the static imports for this code block.
1286     *
1287     *  @return The static imports.
1288     */
1289    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
1290    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.2.0" )
1291    public final Set<String> getStaticImports() { return m_StaticImports; }
1292
1293    /**
1294     *  {@inheritDoc}
1295     */
1296    @Override
1297    public final int hashCode() { return hash( m_Composer, toString() ); }
1298
1299    /**
1300     *  {@inheritDoc}
1301     */
1302    @Override
1303    public final boolean hasModifier( final Modifier modifier ) { return m_Modifiers.contains( requireNonNullArgument( modifier, "modifier" ) ); }
1304
1305    /**
1306     *  The initializer for
1307     *  {@link #m_CachedString}.
1308     *
1309     *  @return The return value for
1310     *      {@link #toString()}.
1311     */
1312    private final String initializeCachedString()
1313    {
1314        final var resultBuilder = new StringBuilder();
1315        final var codeWriter = new CodeWriter( m_Composer, resultBuilder );
1316        try
1317        {
1318            emit( codeWriter, Optional.of( "Constructor" ), Set.of() );
1319        }
1320        catch( final UncheckedIOException e )
1321        {
1322            throw new UnexpectedExceptionError( e.getCause() );
1323        }
1324        final var retValue = resultBuilder.toString();
1325
1326        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1327        return retValue;
1328    }   //  initializeCachedString()
1329
1330    /**
1331     *  {@inheritDoc}
1332     */
1333    @Override
1334    public final boolean isConstructor() { return m_Name.equals( CONSTRUCTOR ); }
1335
1336    /**
1337     *  Checks whether the last entry of the given parameter list is an array.
1338     *
1339     *  @param  parameters  The parameter list.
1340     *  @return {@code true} if the last entry of the given parameter list is
1341     *      an array type, {@code false} if not.
1342     */
1343    @SuppressWarnings( "BooleanMethodNameMustStartWithQuestion" )
1344    private static final boolean lastParameterIsArray( final List<ParameterSpecImpl> parameters )
1345    {
1346        final var retValue = !parameters.isEmpty() && TypeName.asArray( (parameters.get( parameters.size() - 1 ).type() ) ).isPresent();
1347
1348        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1349        return retValue;
1350    }   //  lastParameterIsArray()
1351
1352    /**
1353     *  Returns a builder for a regular method.
1354     *
1355     *  @param  name    The name for the method.
1356     *  @return The builder.
1357     *
1358     *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
1359     *      {@link JavaComposer}.
1360     */
1361    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
1362    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
1363    public static final BuilderImpl methodBuilder( final CharSequence name )
1364    {
1365        final var retValue = new BuilderImpl( new JavaComposer(), name );
1366
1367        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1368        return retValue;
1369    }   //  methodBuilder()
1370
1371    /**
1372     *  {@inheritDoc}
1373     */
1374    @Override
1375    public final Set<Modifier> modifiers() { return m_Modifiers; }
1376
1377    /**
1378     *  {@inheritDoc}
1379     */
1380    @Override
1381    public final String name() { return m_Name; }
1382
1383    /**
1384     *  <p>{@summary Returns a new method spec builder for a method that
1385     *  overrides the given method.}</p>
1386     *  <p>This new builder will copy visibility modifiers, type parameters,
1387     *  return type, name, parameters, and throws declarations. An
1388     *  {@link Override}
1389     *  annotation will be added.</p>
1390     *
1391     *  @note   In JavaPoet&nbsp;1.2 through 1.7 this method retained
1392     *      annotations from the method and parameters of the overridden
1393     *      method. Since JavaPoet&nbsp;1.8 and in JavaComposer annotations
1394     *      must be added separately.
1395     *
1396     *  @param  method  The method to override.
1397     *  @return The builder.
1398     *
1399     *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
1400     *      {@link JavaComposer}.
1401     */
1402    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
1403    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
1404    public static final BuilderImpl overriding( final ExecutableElement method )
1405    {
1406        final var composer = new JavaComposer();
1407        final var retValue = (BuilderImpl) composer.overridingMethodBuilder( method );
1408
1409        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1410        return retValue;
1411    }   //  overriding()
1412
1413    /**
1414     *  <p>{@summary Returns a new method spec builder that overrides the given
1415     *  method as a member of of the given enclosing class.} This will resolve
1416     *  type parameters: for example overriding
1417     *  {@link Comparable#compareTo}
1418     *  in a type that implements {@code Comparable<Movie>}, the {@code T}
1419     *  parameter will be resolved to {@code Movie}.</p>
1420     *  <p>This will copy its visibility modifiers, type parameters, return
1421     *  type, name, parameters, and throws declarations. An
1422     *  {@link Override}
1423     *  annotation will be added.</p>
1424     *
1425     *  @note   In JavaPoet&nbsp;1.2 through 1.7 this method retained
1426     *      annotations from the method and parameters of the overridden
1427     *      method. Since JavaPoet&nbsp;1.8 and in JavaComposer annotations
1428     *      must be added separately.
1429     *
1430     *  @param  method  The method to override.
1431     *  @param  enclosing   The enclosing class for the method.
1432     *  @param  types   The type variables.
1433     *  @return The builder.
1434     *
1435     *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
1436     *      {@link JavaComposer}.
1437     */
1438    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
1439    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
1440    public static final BuilderImpl overriding( final ExecutableElement method, final DeclaredType enclosing, final Types types )
1441    {
1442        final var composer = new JavaComposer();
1443        final var retValue = (BuilderImpl) composer.overridingMethodBuilder( method, enclosing, types );
1444
1445        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1446        return retValue;
1447    }   //  overriding()
1448
1449    /**
1450     *  <p>{@summary Returns a new method spec builder for a method that
1451     *  overrides the given method.}</p>
1452     *  <p>This new builder will copy visibility modifiers, type parameters,
1453     *  return type, name, parameters, and throws declarations. An
1454     *  {@link Override}
1455     *  annotation will be added, but any other annotation will be omitted;
1456     *  this is consistent with the behaviour of
1457     *  {@link #overriding(ExecutableElement)}
1458     *  and
1459     *  {@link #overriding(ExecutableElement, DeclaredType, Types)}.</p>
1460     *
1461     *  @param  method  The method to override.
1462     *  @return The builder.
1463     *
1464     *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
1465     *      {@link JavaComposer}.
1466     */
1467    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
1468    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.8" )
1469    public static final BuilderImpl overriding( final Method method )
1470    {
1471        final var composer = new JavaComposer();
1472        final var retValue = (BuilderImpl) composer.overridingMethodBuilder( method );
1473
1474        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1475        return retValue;
1476    }   //  overriding()
1477
1478    /**
1479     *  {@inheritDoc}
1480     */
1481    @Override
1482    public final Collection<ParameterSpec> parameters() { return List.copyOf( m_Parameters ); }
1483
1484    /**
1485     *  {@inheritDoc}
1486     */
1487    @Override
1488    public final TypeName returnType()
1489    {
1490        final var retValue = nonNull( m_ReturnType ) ? m_ReturnType : VOID_PRIMITIVE;
1491
1492        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1493        return retValue;
1494    }   //  returnType()
1495
1496    /**
1497     *  {@inheritDoc}
1498     */
1499    @Override
1500    public final String signature()
1501    {
1502        final var joiner = new StringJoiner( ", ", format( "%s( ", name() ), " )" );
1503        joiner.setEmptyValue( format( "%s()", name() ) );
1504        m_Parameters.stream()
1505            .map( parameter -> parameter.type().toString() )
1506            .forEach( joiner::add );
1507        final var retValue = joiner.toString();
1508
1509        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1510        return retValue;
1511    }   //  signature()
1512
1513    /**
1514     *  {@inheritDoc}
1515     */
1516    @SuppressWarnings( {"AccessingNonPublicFieldOfAnotherObject"} )
1517    @Override
1518    public final BuilderImpl toBuilder( final boolean omitCode )
1519    {
1520        final var retValue = new BuilderImpl( m_Composer, m_Name );
1521        retValue.m_Javadoc.addWithoutDebugInfo( m_Javadoc );
1522        retValue.m_Annotations.addAll( m_Annotations );
1523        retValue.m_Modifiers.addAll( m_Modifiers );
1524        if( omitCode ) retValue.m_Modifiers.add( ABSTRACT );
1525        retValue.m_TypeVariables.addAll( m_TypeVariables );
1526        retValue.m_ReturnType = m_ReturnType;
1527        retValue.m_ReturnComment.addWithoutDebugInfo( m_ReturnComment );
1528        retValue.m_Parameters.addAll( m_Parameters );
1529        retValue.m_Exceptions.addAll( m_Exceptions );
1530        if( !omitCode ) retValue.m_Code.addWithoutDebugInfo( m_Code );
1531        retValue.m_Varargs = m_Varargs;
1532        retValue.m_DefaultValue = m_DefaultValue.orElse( null );
1533        retValue.m_StaticImports.addAll( m_StaticImports );
1534
1535        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1536        return retValue;
1537    }   //  toBuilder()
1538
1539    /**
1540     *  {@inheritDoc}
1541     */
1542    @Override
1543    public final String toString() { return m_CachedString.get(); }
1544}
1545//  class MethodSpecImpl
1546
1547/*
1548 *  End of File
1549 */
